title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Learning-Centered Higher Education Design for Highly Skilled Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Professional field (medical/legal/technical) practical experience and degree attainment
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three field requirements when designing industry-linked curricula
Learners can develop at least one assessment rubric reflecting institutional core competencies
Learners can construct a three-stage learning activity design model executable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
